content:
Tim Abbott said:

...you'll not get an email notification if you read the message before it would have been sent...

This was the issue, myself (and the users) have the desktop app open on another window / monitor, so they're "reading" the notification even if it hasn't been seen by their eyes.
Thanks @Tim Abbott and @Alex Vandiver , my experience moving my organization onto Zulip has been fantastic :-)
Steve has marked this topic as resolved.
